Module kivakit.resource
Package com.telenav.kivakit.filesystem

Class Folders

java.lang.Object
com.telenav.kivakit.filesystem.Folders
public class Folders extends Object
Locations of well-known folders, and argument and switch parser builders for folders.

  • currentFolder()
  • desktopFolder()
  • kivakitCacheFolder()
